desc: Dealer in all marine Electronics including Garmin, Humminbird, Lowrance, Minn Kota, Motorguide, Atlas, Simrad, Raymarine and also all kinds of marine rigging and more. We produce our own line of H.O.E. modular marine grade mounts. We offer professional install of all products sold from our shop at our shop, in person.

layout.text: The best gear, thoughtfully bundled, at a great price!
